t: Start a Dance Party with Echo Glow - Amazon Customer Service
s: You can change the music while the Dance Party is in progress. To stop the music, say, “Stop,” and the light changes to a solid color. Note: Your Echo device and Echo Glow need to be in the same group for Dance Party to work.

t: Amazon’s Echo Glow is a $29 lamp for Alexa dance parties and bedtime stories
s: Amazon is launching a new lamp for Alexa, the Echo Glow. It can be used for bedtimes, Alexa-powered dance parties, and even in a campfire-like mode. It will cycle through a variety of colors and you can tap the device to pick your favorite.
